name: Welcome To My Zen Garden
description:
WELCOME TO MY ZEN GARDEN!      hardcore mode   A cute little slice of life game where you can not lose.   A wonderful castle with nineteen unique rooms.   A relaxation from busy city life.   Take a stroll through the secret flower garden, ponder at the ponds, stare at ancient stones.   Feeling lost? Chat with nice and helpful monks.   All combined in a charming pixel artstyle and sprinkled with haikus from Basho.   Chop wood and carry water, my friend!

controls: arrow keys + x + y/z
